description: This file implements a component object for managing an array of strings in C, including functions for creating, removing, initializing, and managing the string array. It includes object-oriented style functions such as create, remove, enroll objects, and initialize, with detailed comments and licensing information.

classes.name: ANSC_STRING_ARRAY_OBJECT
classes.description: A C structure representing a string array component object, inheriting from a base component object and containing function pointers and data members for managing a string array.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscStringArrayCOCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new string array component object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscStringArrayCORemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the string array object and frees associated memory.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscStringArrayCOEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls required objects for the string array component.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscStringArrayCOInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the member variables and function pointers of the string array component object.
